channel.title: .dat files, (How to use them)
channel.description:
Hello, thank you for viewing my topic. ;D
Can anyone please make a [TuT] on how to use .dat files in your client? I have a great file i just converted from .mqo to .dat and I have also gzipped it. Heres the file:[url=http://www.2shared.com/file/3782530/b09a0760/hat1bdat.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/3782530/b09a0760/hat1bdat.html[/url] I would absoloutley love it if someone could post a [TuT] or great post with directions, on how to use a .dat file on your client. If someone posts it, ill give you a download link to a .mqo to .dat file converter!
Please take your time and effort into this, The completely lost :| xxzunoxx
P.S. My msn is xxzunoxx@live.com [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2008, 05:44:17 pm[/size][hr]Someone please help! :confused: :|
